韛字的基本解释

韛
bài
古代用来鼓风吹火的皮囊：“敌人有伏地道内者，便下柴火，以皮韛吹之。”

韛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bài］
［《廣韻》蒲拜切，去怪，並。］
“排2”的被通假字。
古代鼓风吹火的皮囊。俗称风箱。

韛字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【韋字部】　韛； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1394第44
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?步拜切，音憊。【玉篇】韋囊，可以吹火令熾。亦作?。【廣韻】或作?。【集韻】或作?㰆。　又【集韻】房六切，音伏。本作箙。詳竹部箙字註。

韛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
韛字的起名意思

暂无。

韛
Basic explanation of words
韛
bài
A leather bag used to blow the wind and fire in ancient times: "If the enemy has a person in the tunnel, he will set off the firewood and blow it with the leather jade."
韛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bài］
["Guangyun" Pu Baiqie, go to blame, and. ]
"Pai 2" was passed falsely.
Ancient blasted skin. Commonly known as bellows.
韛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji] [Wei Zi Department] 　韛; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1394 44
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Step by step, sound tired. [Jade articles] Wei Nang, you can blow fire and make chi. Also for?. [Guang Yun] Or make?. [Ji Yun] Or as? 㰆.　[Jiyun] The room has six cuts, and the sound goes down. This is a 箙. Detailed notes on bamboo 箙.

Nothing.

(2) 又如: 风韛, 韛拐子
